name: Present Trek
description:
This game was made for the Secret Santa jam held by GameMakerItalia!

The game's purpose is to make a map for a friend and then zip the game folder to send it their way (and start a chain of maps made by friends). It can be used as a cheap present for a birthday or for Christmas, too!

Big thanks to Scario & Carcallo for hosting the fun event and again, merry (late) Christmas Yoi!

 

External resources:
Shaun Spalding Game Maker tutorials
Pokémon TCG (gb) OST
Etalify - Traverse Town 8bit cover

Enjoy your festivities, folks <3
